      • mergeOld

        public static Condition mergeOld(Condition condition1,
                                 Condition condition2)
        Merges condition1 into condition2 and leaves the two conditions untouched.
        Parameters:
        condition1 - the condition to be merged into condition2
        condition2 - condition1 will be merged into this one
        Returns:
        a new condition object with condition1 merged into condition2

      • abstractMerge

        public static Condition abstractMerge(Condition condition1,
                                      Condition condition2)
                               throws FileStructureException
        Merges condition1 into condition2 leaving both parameters untouched. Takes the difference between two conditions and marks them as optional nodes.
        Parameters:
        condition1 - A condition to be merged
        condition2 - A condition to be merged
        Returns:
        the merged condition
        Throws:
        FileStructureException - if a merge conflict occurs
